title: updating again
body: i was playing a game 15 mins ago and when i won the game told me to exit as it cant reconnect when i tried to open it again it starts the 40MB update the launcher downloads 59MB/40MB an then resets idk what is happening

replies.body: It kinda sounds like your client may not have disconnected perse, but rather that might have been a crash at the end of the match when the client realized there were some damaged or missing game files. If that update never seems to go through correctly, try using this [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the option **force repatch** turned on. Lemme know if that doesn't help though!

Good luck getting a response. I have been getting the whole reconnect thing ever since the latest patch. And, I am up to 25 minute wait times because it tells me I am leaving games, but it never actually loads the client for me to play any games once past the champ select. And, as I can see, I am not the only one having these sort of technical errors. Also, after reading through the forums, RIOT has their middle finger raised and are in no rush to aid those who are experiencing difficulty.  They will still gladly take your money, though. :)
